sentences.en: a forceful attack on government policy
sentences.cn: 对政府政策的有力抨击

sentences.en: Even his closest allies describe him as forceful, aggressive and determined.
sentences.cn: 即使他最亲密的盟友也认为他强硬决断、咄咄逼人，不达目的誓不罢休。

sentences.en: For most people a heart attack is a forceful reminder that they are mortal.
sentences.cn: 对多数人来说，心脏病发作会强烈地提醒他们终有一天自己会死去。

sentences.en: He was forceful, but by no means a zealot.
sentences.cn: 他个性坚定，但绝不是什么狂热分子。

sentences.en: His article was brief and forceful.
His calligraphy is vigorous and forceful.
His forceful arguments silenced his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他论辩有力,把对方说得哑口无言.

sentences.en: If he put his finger over the nozzle he could produce a forceful spray.
sentences.cn: 如果他把手指按在喷嘴上，就可以产生强力的喷射。

sentences.en: In a very forceful speech he set about his critics.
sentences.cn: 他以有力的发言驳斥了他的批评者.

sentences.en: Into her nineties, her thinking remained acute and her character forceful.
sentences.cn: 虽已年届九旬，她依然头脑敏锐，个性很强。

sentences.en: It made a very forceful impression on me.
sentences.cn: 它给我留下了深刻的印象。
她作了一次有力的发言.

sentences.en: She was a forceful intellectual unafraid to speak her mind.
sentences.cn: 她是个很有魄力的知识分子，不惧怕说出自己的想法。

sentences.en: The only way to take the enemy position is by strategy , not by forceful attack.
sentences.cn: 只可智取, 不可强攻.

sentences.en: The refutation is forceful and every word hits home.

words.tran_cn: 强制的；暴力的；有说服力的；强有力的
强有力地；激烈地；有说服力地
用力地；强制地；有说服力地

trans.tran_cn: 强有力的，有说服力的，有效的，强劲
trans.tran_en: a forceful person expresses their opinions very strongly and clearly and people are easily persuaded by them
